note: GDP data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices.
title: Changes in energy use vs. changes in GDP
subtitle: Consumption-based (trade-adjusted) [primary energy](#dod:primaryenergy) use measures domestic energy use minus energy used to produce exported goods, plus energy used to produce imported goods. Gross domestic product (GDP) is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
sourceDesc: Energy data is calculated by Viktoras Kulionis, based on the EXIOBASE v3.8.2 database; GDP data from the World Bank
